sub_title: Site and construction manager-Biomimicry practitioner. Feng Shui practitioner. Amateur Violinist
summary: I am an amateur violinist, entrepreneur  and experienced Architect  mainly involver in large scale buildings, from feasibility studies to hand over with a demonstrated history of working in the architectural industry. Skilled in design, project management, site management with a strong  focus in a continuous  professional development.  Beside the traditional architectural profession I am also Feng Shui consultant since almost two decade. I studied Chinese metaphysics- Feng Shui from the Mastery Academy of Chinese Metaphysics and recently became a Biomimicry practitioner.

projects.title: Primo Vere_Rinascimento
projects.description: We are interested in bringing together the protagonists of the Italian Renaissance with the Dutch counter part in order to show how the two countries influenced each other and participated to enlighten the following centuries. We will exhibit at the Prinsenkwartier, Delft. The opening is planned for March 2017. Sponsors are still very welcome!

projects.title: The Nipple Party Project
projects.description: October 2015 was the Month of Breast Cancer Awareness. Due to the experience I gained in the past years, I have been approached by Sue Laurence, PhD in Public Health, to support her as project coordinator for the Nipple Party Project. The project aimed to create a moment of celebration for Sue Lawrence in her breast cancer experience and to bring awareness within the Delft community. During the evening we launched Sue`s  new book, a short documentary.

projects.description: The house is located in one of the prettiest canals in  Delft, Vlamingstraat and most importantly the "Straatje van Vermeer".  This has been a nice opportunity to work with a local manufacture to build  custom made bookcases for the living room and for the studio and to propose high end Italian design, such as  La Murrina and Pacini& Cappellini.

projects.title: Feng shui Workshop
projects.description:
Within the project Anima Migrante "The Inner Journey" we introduced the workshop "Home Sweet Home(?)".
The purpose of the workshop is to discover how we shape our own space during the process of adaptation to a new social contest. The workshop integrates the free manipulation of clay and the principles of feng shui. 
Through the construction of  clay figures we explore the spaces in order to awaken a more plesant relation with the space we occupy.
Feng shui and psychology always dealt with “spaces” psychological and physical  and with "Home sweet Home(?)we guide the partecipant  to connect with their habitative space just following their intuition, in a setting where there are almost no stimulations.

projects.title: Exhibition- Anima Migrante_the inner journey
projects.description:
With this exhibition we will talk about psychological journey of women coming from different cultures who have chosen to emigrate in the Netherlands. 
Anima Migrante-The inner journey wants to highlight the successes of self realization of immigrant women from different backgrounds in the Netherlands. 
 Women are the central subjects of the project. This choice is connected to the contemporary phenomenon of the feminization of migration.
The choice of this theme arises from the fact that there is not a wide literature that considers the personal psychological processes of migrant women, while extensive is the bibliography relating to male migration from a social and political point of view. We will explain how different cultural backgrounds can lead to similar psychological processes and experiences.

profile_positions.location: Amsterdam, Groningen, Den Haag, Heerlen, Netherlands
profile_positions.description:
On project basis I am engaged by  international GC leaders  in the interior construction for retail, commercial and residential projects. Ganter interior first, currently Keller Italia.
Winner of few tenders for an American department store chain expanding in The Netherlands, the first GC engaged me the first time to fulfil Site/construction Managment duties and later to fulfil Project Coordinator Manager duties. Main focus is coordination of work flow based on time schedule, site H&S assessment, compliance with protocols and site attendance. In charge to assist and attend the Practical Completion, facilitate the foreigner site management.  Responsible to have  snags list completed and Hand Over. To assist the client until the opening and follow up within the insurance time period.
profile_positions.title: Site Manager and Project Coordinator Manager in The Netherlands
